title: Soccer Heading and Cognitive Function: Analysis of Short-Term Learning Impact and Management Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of soccer match regulations and basic exercise biomechanics, along with understanding of cognitive assessment methods
context.additional_context: A course for corporate sports safety managers, focusing on analyzing the relationship between heading and cognitive function and strengthening practical application skills.

learning_goals: Participants can analyze the correlation between soccer heading frequency and short-term memory using experimental data
Participants can recognize gender-based differences in heading impact and develop team-specific safety management strategies.
Participants can apply learning curve modeling and interpretation methods based on two-week repeated test results.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
